revised_title: Magnetohydrodynamic Power Generation: Closed Cycle m.p.d. Systems and Non-Equilibrium Ionization Techniques
tldr: The article discusses advanced methods of energy conversion, specifically focusing on magnetohydrodynamic power generation and closed cycle m.p.d. systems. It explores various techniques for achieving non-equilibrium ionization, which allows for higher temperatures and better efficiency in power generation. The article also examines the prospects for closed cycle m.p.d. power generation and the ongoing research and development in the United Kingdom.
